about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Who am I?
about.description: Passionate Full-Stack Developer based in Fès, Morocco. I create modern, performant, and accessible web applications.
about.sectionDescription: Passionate about building modern, high-performance web experiences. I combine a minimalist approach with meticulous attention to technical detail to turn your ideas into efficient, elegant, long-lasting digital products.
